title: What Philosophy Can Tell You about Your Dog
description: Do dogs live in the same world as humans? Is it wrong to think dogs have personalities and emotions? What are dogs thinking and whatâ€™s the nature of canine wisdom? This is a book for thoughtful dog-lovers who want to explore the deeper issues raised by dogs and their relationships with humans. Twenty philosophers and dog-lovers reveal their experiences with dogs and give their insights on dog-related themes of metaphysics and ethics.
author: Steven D. Hales
